page.title: 13CHURCHES, CHAPEL IN HASELOR
page.content: The parish church of Haselor has not changed very much over the last 25 years.This year the choir had their own cassocks. The paths leading up to the church have been resurfaced so it is easier to walk up to church in the dark. The church (All Saints,C.E.) at Billesley is open for services twice a year. If you want to visit it you should see the Vicar of Wilmcote or ask at Billesley Manor Hotel. Haselor church shares a vicar with Great Alne and Kinwarton churches. The Baptist Chapel by the crossroads in Haselor was converted to a house a few years ago. There are three floors in it,the bottom floor still has the old font in it and there are candlestick holders everywhere. In one bedroom there is a built-in wardrobe and with a picture painted inside.The stones with dates and names on are still in the walls.
